name: Pac-Man III
overview: A Sierra On-Line game for the C64, this isn't your average Pac-Man clone. It uses the Commodore "3D" Labyrinth code and has you in something of a first person view of running through the maze and grabbing the dots that look like pucks from this view. Watch out for the ghosts, they are after you. You can see a small representation of the map on the bottom right to help you keep your orientation.
